module.title: Info: Blog
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>blog_posts`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>blog_posts` ( `postId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `authorId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `language` char(2) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `abstract` tinytext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `nrViews` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) DEFAULT NULL, `viewedAt` decimal(12,0) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`postId`), KEY `authorId` (`authorId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `language` (`language`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
